sketchToRender.title: Sketch to Render Pro Tip
sketchToRender.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Complex sketches can impact negativelly on the final result

rightContent.caption: Stick to clean lines without decorations or colors instead

improveRender.title: Improve your render without changing the design
improveRender.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

detailed3dBase.title: Have a very detailed 3d Base with colors patterns and texture?
detailed3dBase.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

removeObjectsWithShadow.title: While removing object, choose shadows too
removeObjectsWithShadow.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

rightContent.caption: Choose the object with its shadow

removeObjectsHardTime.title: Are you having a hard time removing an object?
removeObjectsHardTime.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

createImpressiveResults.title: Not getting impressive instant results? That's part of the process.
createImpressiveResults.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Prompt: design me a beautiful house

rightContent.caption: Prompt: photo of a family house in Greece, on the mountain with a winery garden, modern white clay facade, clear sky

createUnnaturalElements.title: Are people, vehicles or animals appearing unnaturally or creepy?
createUnnaturalElements.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Don't use images where faces or features look distorted or unnatural!

rightContent.caption: Use upscale to fix people and enhance the details!

createPool.title: Is the pool not appearing in your output?
createPool.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Don't keep trying to generate with the same prompt!

rightContent.caption: Use "Select and Modify": Mask the pool area and describe the pool in the prompt section for better results.

selectSky.title: Didn't like the sky or background in your render?
selectSky.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Don't keep trying to generate again!

rightContent.caption: Use "Select and Modify": Mask the sky area, describe the scene in the prompt box, or upload a reference image for a better result.

3dCleanResults.title: Not getting clean results?
3dCleanResults.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Avoid any other screen elements on the base image

sketchCleanResults.title: Not getting clean results?
sketchCleanResults.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Don't put a frame around your sketch

rightContent.caption: Do make it full screen or crop the edges for a cleaner render.

sketchFloating.title: Does your building look like it's floating or missing a clean background?
sketchFloating.subtitle: While you wait, here are some tips to generate better results:

leftContent.caption: Don't only draw the building in the middle of the page.

rightContent.caption: Do add enough details like the horizon, ground level, and surrounding environment such as trees.

blockView.title: This page is not accessible on this screen size.
blockView.description: Please access from a desktop or tablet for optimal viewing

renderType.title: Ready to Create Stunning Visuals?
renderType.description: Begin by indicating if you're envisioning an interior or exterior scene
renderType.dontShow: Do not show this screen again

workflow.title: Choose how you would like to create your renderings
workflow.description: Select your initial source of inspiration, knowing that you can combine other options later

queue.title: Queue for Image Generation
queue.description: Your generation will be ready in approximately {{estimatedTime}}
queue.card: You are currently {{position}} in the queue

generating.title: Generating your image
generating.description: It should be ready in approximately {{estimatedTime}}

errors.file-too-large: File size is too large, the maximum allowed size is {{maxMb}}MB
errors.too-many-files: You can only upload one file at a time

errorUploading.title: Error uploading image
errorUploading.description: An error occurred while uploading your image. Please try again.

dialog.title: Select a base image from previous creations

subscription.title: Rendair AI is an exclusive service for subscribers.

sidebar.limitTooltip: You reached the maximum amount of generations at once. Please wait until an image is generated to start the next image.
sidebar.dimensionsBanner: This image is below 500px and could get worse results.
sidebar.longRunningBanner: The Fix People feature can take up to 20 minutes to generate results.
sidebar.imageStrengthTooltip: Control how closely the result sticks to the base image. This setting prevails over creativity.
sidebar.referenceImageStrengthTooltip: Control how similar the results should be to the reference image. This may overwrite the prompt description.
sidebar.resemblanceTooltip: Control the depth of textures. Higher % resulting in more depth.
sidebar.promptPlaceholder: Use a paragraph or a few words to describe what you expect in the generated images
sidebar.negativePromptLabel: Describe unwanted elements in the scene
sidebar.negativePromptPlaceholder: Use a few words to describe what you don't want to appear in the generated images
sidebar.creativityTooltip: Control how much the result varies from your provided prompts

generateError.title: Failure to generate the image
generateError.description: An error occurred while generating your image. Please refresh the page.

sidebar.colorStrengthTooltip: Control how much the result varies from the color palette of the base image
sidebar.shapeStrengthTooltip: Control how much the result varies from the shapes of the base image
sidebar.imageStyleStrengthTooltip: Control how much the result varies from the image style

multipleGenerationsTooltip.title: Multiple Generations is a PRO Feature.

fullscreen.compareDisabled: The image lacks a base image for comparison

editor.dropImageHere: Drag your reference image and drop it here
